name: Snorkel Expedition
description: Explore the Caribbean Sea, Beach, Jungle and Caves. Snorkel with the Sea Turtles and in the Coral Reef. Snorkel in the Jungle Cenotes, Underground River System & Bat Cave, Caribbean Sea, Coral Reef and Yal-ku a Natural Aquarium Lagoon - with different kinds of Sea life. The tour takes you through (5) snorkeling systems. Discover an entire new world! Enjoy a four course Lunch at World Famous Oscar & Lalo Restaurant. Continental Breakfast, Snacks, Drinks and Air-conditioned transportation is included. Please note that we only snorkel with the Sea Turtles and in the Coral Reef if conditions are safe - $25 USD will be deducted if unable to participate in this activity.
